titleStmt.title: A word of prophesy, concerning the Parliament, generall, and the army. With A little of the first Adam. Wherein are divers objections answered, concerning that position of God, being the author of sinne. / By Henry Pinnell.
titleStmt.author: Pinnell, Henry.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for George Whittington and Giles Calvert, and are to be sold at the Blew Anchor neare the Royall Exchange in Cornhill,

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication from Wing.
"A little of the first Adam, and how occasioned" has caption title.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Blew Anchor neare the Royall Exchange in Cornhill
